players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Bob: "I'm still trying to figure out what happened with Charlie. I'll keep an eye on everyone."
Diana: "I'm the mafioso and I killed Charlie last night. Keep an eye on me, Bob."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
